item.description:
Back of Box

The HOT WHEELS Custom Car Designer includes everything you need to design cool HOT WHEELS cars and accessories on your PC. It’s easy! Just design… print out… and customize! Take a tour of the HOT WHEELS City for unlimited hours of customizing fun!
 Customization Garage
 PICK a car! PAINT it a cool color! ADD new parts, logos, and decals!
 Department Of Motor Vehicles
 CREATE your own pretend driver’s license, license plates, and traffic tickets!
 Victory Lane
 BUILD your very own course for racing and crashing!
 · Choose from 20 on-screen HOT WHEELS cars to customize!
· Select one of eight custom colors for a new paint job!
· Add tires, engines, spoilers, logos, decals, and more!
· Design and print out cool stickers for your toy cars and track!
· Make hundreds of personalized HOT WHEELS accessories like business cards, letterheads, newsletters, birthday cards, and more!
· Create a pretend driver’s license, license plates, and “funny” traffic tickets.
· Cruise by the Information Window to check out the HOT WHEELS Web site at www.hotwheels.com (Note: Internet access required)
· Build your own race course complete with grandstands, pennants, and banners!
· Make barricades and buildings for crashing!
· Print out trophies and ribbons for prize-winning races and “most outrageous” crashes!
